attributes.action: Do NOT pass an act to repeal the 1972 European Communities Act.
attributes.additional_details: There is no £350million for the NHS, "That was a mistake".  There is no full access to the EU markets without migration. The politicians and public can see the grand mistakes that have been made, but seem happy to continue down this path to madness, "Because that is what you wanted."  No-one wants the racism! Greed of businesses is the cause of this hatred. Migrants don't take our jobs, they are given them, exploited by businesses by paying them less than the domestic workforce REFORM BUSINESSES
attributes.background:
The country has made an awful mistake, but Parliament has to repeal the 1972 European Communities Act before they can invoke Article 50 to begin leaving the EU.
Stop us leaving the EU
Stand up against the misinformation that was given to the public. Stand up for justice and equality for all.
